RDF and RDF Schema

5.5 SPARQL query forms
5.6 Hands-on activity
SPARQL query forms
• SELECT
– Returns all, or a subset of, the variables bound in a query pattern 
match.
• CONSTRUCT
CONSTRUCT
– Returns an RDF graph constructed by substituting variables in a set 
of triple templates.
• ASK
– Returns a boolean indicating whether a query pattern matches or 
not.
• DESCRIBE
– Returns an RDF graph that describes the resources found.
